# QrCode Api Written in Go
go-version :-> 1.7

### Dependencies
```bash
go get
```

### Run
```bash
go run server.go
```

## Api
### Making new QrCode
```txt
Route: /new
Query: 
* message
    Note: Data of QrCode
```
